Name: Sneak Attack
Description: Deals an extra (2d6) damage when attacking a creature that is surprised or has an ally within 5 feet of it.

Name: Expertise
Description: Becomes proficient in two skills or tools of their choice.

Name: Thieves' Cant
Description: Can communicate with other thieves using a secret language called thieves' cant.

Name: Cunning Action
Description: Can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Name: Uncanny Dodge
Description: Can use a reaction to halve the damage taken from an attack that hits.

Name: Evasion
Description: Can use a reaction to completely avoid taking damage from certain area of effect spells and traps.

Name: Reliable Talent
Description: Can always roll a natural 10 or higher on ability checks with a certain skill or tool.

Name: Blindsense
Description: Can sense the presence and location of creatures within 10 feet, even if they are invisible or in darkness.

Name: Slipperiness
Description: Can use a bonus action to escape from being grappled or restrained.

Name: Elusive
Description: Has advantage on saving throws against spells and other effects that target them.

Name: Stroke of Luck
Description: Can use a reaction to turn a missed attack into a hit or a failed ability check into a success.
